title: Get background svg
description: Get SVG image with stars (query params)

width.description: The `width` parameter restricts the size of the canvas in horizontal

height.description: The `height` parameter restricts the size of the canvas in vertical

minItems.description: The `minItems` parameter restricts the minimum number of circles in canvas

maxItems.description: The `maxItems` parameter restricts the maximum number of circles in canvas

minItemSize.description: The `minItemSize` parameter restricts the minimum radius size of the circles

maxItemSize.description: The `maxItemSize` parameter restricts the maxium radius size of the circles
